item.title: What I found by building my own NodeJS boilerplate.
item.description: What I found by building my own NodeJS boilerplate. Mongoose Tips Iâ€™ve played with Mongoose a lot in the past week. Iâ€™ve built a NodeJS API boilerplate for help me kickstart some REST API project. I setup the regular auth using PassportJS with the local and JWT strategies. By doing this I found some useful tricks with Mongoose. Some tips I never really see somewhere â€˜maybe I didnâ€™t search lot ðŸ˜ƒâ€™ and I want to share you what I found.
